gurmukhi: auGtY qwn qrMg rMig Aiq; igAwn gIq bMDwnM ]
transliteration: Oughtaitaan Taran Ran(i) At(i) Gyaan Geet Bandhaanan||
translation: The wave of colourful tune will arise, manifesting the song of knowledge,

gurmukhi: cik cik rhy dyv dwnv muin; Cik Cik bÎom ibvwnM ]2]
transliteration: Chak(i) Chak(i) Rahe Dev Daanav Mounndi) Chhak(i) Chhak(i) Byom Bivaanan||2||
translation: The gods, demons and sages would be amazed enjoying their ride in heavenly chariots.2.

gurmukhi: Awqm aupdys Bysu sMjm ko; jwp su Ajpw jwpy ]
transliteration: Aatam Oupdesh Bhes(i) Sanjam Ko Jaap(i) Sanjam Ko Jaap Su Ajapaa Jaape||
translation: While instructing the self in the garb of self-restraint and reciting God’s Name inwardly,

gurmukhi: sdw rhY kMcn sI kwXw; kwl n kbhUM bÎwpy ]3]2]
transliteration: Sadaa Rahi Kanchanndkikaayaa Kaal Na Kah-hoon Byaape||3||2||
translation: The body will always remain like gold and become immortal.3.2.
O Man ! fall at the feet of the supreme Purusha,

gurmukhi: sovq khw moh inMdRw mY; kbhUM suicq hÍY jwgo ]1] rhwau ]
transliteration: Sovat Kahaa Moh Nindraa Mai Kah-hoon Souchit Havaijaajo||1|| Rahaao||
translation: Why are you sleeping in worldly attachment, awake sometimes and be vigilant ?.....Pause.

gurmukhi: AOrn kh aupdysq hY psu; qoih prboD n lwgo ]
transliteration: Auran Kah Oupdeshat Hai Pasu Tohe Prabhdh Na Laage||
translation: O Animal ! why do you preach to others, when you are quite ignorant;

gurmukhi: isMcq khw pry ibiKXn kh; kbhu ibKY rs qÎwgo ]1]
transliteration: Sinchat Kahaa Dare Bikhiyan Kah Kab-hu Bikhai Ras Tyaago||1||
translation: Why are you gathering the sins ? Forsake sometimes the poisonous enjoyment.1.

gurmukhi: kyvl krm Brm sy cInhu; Drm krm Anurwgo ]
transliteration: Kaval Karam Bharam Ke Cheenoh Dharam Karam Anuraago||
translation: Consider these actions as illusions and devote yourself to righteous actions,

gurmukhi: sMgRh kro sdw ismrn ko; prm pwp qij Bwgo ]2]
transliteration: Sanrah(i) Daro Sadaa Simran Ko Param Paap Taj(i) Bhaago||2||
translation: Absorb yourself in the remembrance of the name of the Lord and abandon and run away from sins.2.

gurmukhi: jW qy dUK pwp nih BytY; kwl jwl qy qwgo ]
transliteration: Jaa Te Dookh Paap Nah(i) Bhetai Kaal Jaal Te Taago||
translation: So that the sorrows and sins do not afflict you and you may escape the trap of death;

gurmukhi: jO suK cwho sdw sBn kO; qO hir ky rs pwgo ]3]3]
transliteration: Jau Souch Chaaho Sadaa Sabhan Kau Tau Har(i) Ke Raspaago||3||3||
translation: If you want to enjoy all comforts, then absorb yourself in the love of the Lord.3.3.
RAGA SORATH OF THE TENTH KING
